rule.name: ddm_nom_an
rule.comment: This is to catch abbreviated days of the week Do an 25 Lúnasa -> dé domhnaigh an cúigiú lá is fiche de mhí lúnasa

rule.name: ddm_nom_an_two_word_month
rule.comment: This is to catch abbreviated days of the week Do an 25 Meán Fómhair -> dé domhnaigh an cúigiú lá is fiche de mhí mheán fómhair

rule.name: ddm_nom
rule.comment: Sa 30 Iúil -> dé sathairn an tríochadú lá de mhí iúil

rule.name: ddm_nom_two_word_month
rule.comment: Sa 30 Meán Fómhair -> dé sathairn an tríochadú lá de mhí mheán fómhair

rule.name: dmd_nom
rule.comment: Sa Iúil 22 -> dé sathairn an dara lá is fiche de mhí iúil

rule.name: dmd_nom_two_word_month
rule.comment: Sa Meán Fómhair 22 -> dé sathairn an dara lá is fiche de mhí mheán fómhair

rule.name: m_m_two_words_first
rule.comment: Special rule for the two word months in Irish (Meán Fómhair and Deireadh Fómhair) Meán Fómhair-Meitheamh -> meán fómhair go dtí meitheamh

rule.name: m_m_two_words_second
rule.comment: Special rule for the two word months in Irish (Meán Fómhair and Deireadh Fómhair) Meitheamh-Meán Fómhair -> meitheamh go dtí meán fómhair

rule.name: m_m_two_words_both
rule.comment: Special rule for the two word months in Irish (Meán Fómhair and Deireadh Fómhair) Meán Fómhair-Deireadh Fómhair -> meán fómhair go dtí deireadh fómhair

rule.name: m_m
rule.comment: Meitheamh-Bealtaine -> meitheamh go dtí bealtaine

rule.name: dd_the
rule.comment: Cé an 18 -> dé céadaoin an t-ochtú lá déag

rule.name: d_d_hyphenated
rule.comment: Sa-Do, dúnta -> dé sathairn go dtí dé domhnaigh dúnta

rule.name: d_to_d
rule.comment: Lu-Dé, praghas laghdaithe -> dé luain go dtí déardaoin praghas laghdaithe

rule.name: dd
rule.comment: Cé 18 -> dé céadaoin an t-ochtú lá déag

rule.name: d_dm
rule.comment: 25-27 Feabhra-> an cúigiú lá is fiche go dtí an seachtú lá is fiche de mhí na feabhra

rule.name: md_d
rule.comment: Feabhra 25-27 -> an cúigiú lá is fiche go dtí an seachtú lá is fiche de mhí na feabhra

rule.name: d_d_inflected_with_an
rule.comment: Ó 25 go dtí an 27 -> ón gcúigiú lá is fiche go dtí an seachtú lá is fiche

rule.name: d_d_inflected_until1
rule.comment: Ó 25 go 27 -> ón gcúigiú lá is fiche go dtí an seachtú lá is fiche

rule.name: d_d_inflected_until2
rule.comment: Ó 25 go dtí 27 -> ón gcúigiú lá is fiche go dtí an seachtú lá is fiche

rule.name: between_d_dm
rule.comment: idir 23 agus 25 Lúnasa -> idir an tríú lá is fiche agus an cúigiú lá is fiche de mhí lúnasa

rule.name: between_d_dm_two_word_month
rule.comment: idir 23 agus 25 Meán Fómhair -> idir an tríú lá is fiche agus an cúigiú lá is fiche de mhí mheán fómhair

rule.name: dm_nom_two_word_month

rule.name: md_nom
rule.comment: Eanáir 18 -> an t-ochtú lá déag de mhí eanáir Not sure this form is really used, but keep unless it causes an error elsewhere

rule.comment: i Eanáir 2010 -> i mí eanáir dhá mhíle a deich

rule.name: year_01to99
rule.comment: Read range 1901 to 1999 as a year 1990 -> naoi déag nócha

rule.name: year_ad
rule.comment: 800AD -> ocht gcéad d'aois an tiarna

rule.name: year_bc
rule.comment: 800BC -> ocht gcéad roimh chríost
